title: Love Elements
longDescription:
Enjoy the dynamic and action animation template, which includes a unique collection of Love Elements! 

This package contains 15 Love Elements sprite sheet animations for 2D Games.

         

Features:

● Sprite animations work much better than any other shaders and particles due to

memory capacity.

● Optimized for games.

● Pivot point set properly.

● No setup or plug-ins required.

● All materials, sprites and other parts of pack properly named.
technicalDetails:
Video:

https://youtu.be/BQDysdIxlcQ


Technical details:

● File Formats: transparent Png.

● Each frame dimension is 512*288 px.

● 24 FPS


Texture Resolutions:

● Cartoon 01_4096 × 2880

● Cartoon 02_2560 × 1728

● Doodle Flower_2048 × 1728

● Doodle Heart_2560 × 1728

● Doodle Sun_2048 × 1728

● Explosion 01_1536 × 1152

● Explosion 02_2560 × 1728

● Heart 01_2048 × 1728

● Heart 02_3072 × 2304

● Heart 03_3584 × 2592

● Heart 04_2560 × 2016

● Heart 05_2560 × 2016

● Looped Sparcles 01_1536 × 1152

● Looped Sparcles 02_1536 × 1152

● Stars_2048 × 1728


Number of Textures: 15

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)
